english.segment1: You walk around in the wastelands. Turning coal into diamonds. You make things right that were broken. And unsalvageable like me
english.segment2: You make all things new. My heart is the proof. Up above and underground. What is lost will be
english.segment3: Found will be found. I am found in You. I am found its all so different now. That Im found in You
english.segment4: You walk around in the dark lands. Shining light on your children. You make a way through the wilderness. Our twisted ways made straight again
english.segment5: All thats old will pass away. You alone will stay the same. Oh, your love will remain. Yes, your love will remain
